name: Crypto Hamster
description:
Mine cryptocurrency to pay your electricity bill in this First Person Puzzle game. This game was made for  Go Godot Jam 2 with a theme of "Energy source".

Notice: The game might have performance issues on Firefox. Please use other browsers or download the game.

External assets

  • Most 3D-models: Kenney and Quaternius
  • Most sound effects: Voicemod and Freesound
  • Character animations: Mixamo
  • Fonts: Font Library
